sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use the LLF Tech Solutions app and services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information such as name, email address, device information, and usage data to improve our services and ensure proper functionality of the app.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: Your information is used to facilitate inspections, communicate updates, personalize user experience, and for analytics and security purposes.

sections.title: Media Uploads
sections.content: When you upload images or videos during inspections, these files are stored securely and only accessible to authorized personnel for review and action.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal data. Your data may be shared only with authorized stakeholders such as assigned engineers or supervisors to perform relevant tasks.

sections.title: Data Storage and Security
sections.content: Your data is stored on secure servers and cloud storage. We implement technical and organizational measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access or loss.

sections.title: Offline Access
sections.content: Data entered while offline is stored temporarily on your device and synced with our servers when internet is available. This ensures your data is not lost.

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. You can contact us at any time to exercise these rights.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

sections.title: Policy Changes
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified of significant changes through the app or email.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this policy, you can reach us at support@llftech.com.
